patthana4.3:1.1: Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo ca abyākato sappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

patthana4.3:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:12.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre …pe… namagge ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte tīṇi …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
